channel.title: Kyros - Where our server meets your needs
channel.description:
[CENTER]Forums: http://kyros.enjin.com/ Client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/6ggck9nlnd4oxze/Kyrosv1.2.jar?dl=0
Welcome We are a Pvming/Eco/Pking server all in one. Kyros RSPS offers all 23 of OSRS skills, well combat, plenty of pvming, loads of minigames, 100% stability combined with an excellent developer, unique interfaces, and a beautiful server as a whole. We can assure you that if you join us you will have an excellent time here with us at Kyros and will not be dissapointed.
Kyros contains little to no bugs, We are newly released, and we are expecting a long life time at Kyros.
Features
- Customizable client - A Skilled developer - New Bosses - Highscores - Vote System - Auto Donate - Alot of Donator benefits - All skills working - Active community - Frequent Updates - Stable / No Lag - Custom Quests - Perfected Slayer system. - Flawless combat - Helpful & Active staff - 3 Wave Corp - Good economy - Good drop rates
Bosses
- Godwars - KBD - Dagannoths - Kalphite Queen - Corporal Beast - Tormented Demons - Chaos Elemental - Barrelchest - Sea Snake - Nomad - Nex - Avatar of Destruction - + More
- Minigames - - Duel Arena - Barrows - Fight Pits - Fight Cave - Ranging Guild - Warriors Guild - Dungeoneering mini game - Pest control
Here are some Picture :
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/b4wc4y.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2i2a1s9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/11kaumw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2mga35v.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/doxr2x.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/smf5ua.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2emn6si.png[/img]
With time we expect to upgrade VPS's and forums for a better playing experience.
Thankyou and we hope to see you here at Kyros.[/CENTER]

item.title: Kyros - Where our server meets your needs
item.dc:creator: @Kosmos Kosmos
item.description:
@Kosmos wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:2, topic:551753”]This server does not meet my needs.

kidding, but yeah looks like all the other servers out there so gj and gl I guess[/quote]

With the updates we have coming, there will be no other server like it :).

Read full topic
item.source: Kyros - Where our server meets your needs
